meanings.definition: Having a greater amount of hops.
meanings.sent1: The new beer was hoppier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: This beer is hoppier than the one I had yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The bunny felt hoppier after eating the carrot.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement made her heart feel hoppier than ever.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with the hoppier scent of fresh hops.

meanings.sent1: The kangaroo is hoppier than the squirrel.
meanings.sent2: She took a hoppier jump than her friend.
meanings.sent3: The frog felt hoppier than usual after the rain.
meanings.sent4: His mood was hoppier than a bouncing ball.
meanings.sent5: The grasshopper's leap was hoppier than expected.

meanings.sent1: The beer had a hoppier flavor than the cider.
meanings.sent2: This ale is hoppier than the lager.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen smelled hoppier after brewing the beer.
meanings.sent4: The air was hoppier with the scent of fresh hops.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the brewery was hoppier than she had imagined.
